Investor_4_pre_2.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_2.content: Sofia Hernandez has demonstrated keen analytical skills and strategic thinking throughout the investment process, effectively maximizing returns by diligently evaluating the allocation plan. Her behavior showcases a commitment to achieving favorable outcomes while being aware of her rights and responsibilities as an investor. She has reinforced her reputation as a knowledgeable, resourceful, and proactive investor with a focus on securing optimal returns.

Trustee_4_pre_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_4.content: Sofia Hernandez has proposed an allocation plan for the investment but has failed to create a concrete plan due to potential negative perceptions in the relationship with the investor. This rejection reflects poorly on her trustworthiness and ability to establish cooperative relationships, leading to implications on her reputation. She has been accepted by investors in the past, but her current acceptance rate is low (2 rejections, 0 acceptances).
